data.name: Robo Rigs VR
data.description:
Build R/C Car Tracks, Marble Run Contraptions, and more!


Build Your Own R/C Car Tracks

Build your own R/C tracks in VR! With R/C Playground mode, you can build your own R/C circuit with 20 different track styles to choose from! Race with up to 4 friends in multiplayer or by yourself in single player mode. Whether youâ€™re racing on a flat track or over some hills, you can build and race on your circuit anyway you like.

Build Marble Runs & Contraptions 

Create, watch, and build contraptions using marbles, gravity, and your creativity! Build contraptions to race marbles, rig robots to where you want them to go, or team up together with up to 4 friends to build the ultimate marble run. Get creative with over 35+ fun tracks to use, allowing you to come up with your own fun marble runs and contraptions.

Feeling musical?

Place groovy musical notes along your track while your marble rolls through it to play a song! You can even make the robots play notes while it flies through the path that you created for it! There are 6 instruments to choose from with over 100 music notes to use in total!

Marble Run Puzzle Mode

What's more, Robo Rigs VR comes with a fun Marble Puzzle Mode with 30 dynamic levels!
Robots have invaded your room and are dropping balls everywhere! It's your job to guide them to their matching rings by playing with gravity and using a variety of different tracks. Use your creativity to rig tracks and come up with clever solutions to complete each level.
